schema.description: This view consolidates financial data from SAP S4HANA's BKPF and BSEG tables, providing a detailed record of accounting documents.  It includes line-item details, document header information, and calculated fields such as amounts in local currency, due dates, and aging analysis. The data is at the line item level of accounting documents.

formula.value: IF(BSEG.AUGDT IS NULL, COALESCE(BSEG.DMBTR * TCURXHWAER.CURRFIX, BSEG.DMBTR), 0)

description.value: Amount in local currency at clearing date

formula.value: `cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.NetDueDateCalc`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T)
`cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.DueDateForCashDiscount1`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T)

description.value: Calculated due date for cash discount 1

formula.value: `cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.DueDateForCashDiscount2`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T)

description.value: Calculated due date for cash discount 2

formula.value:
IF(BSEG.H_BUDAT < CURRENT_DATE() AND `cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.NetDueDateCalc`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T) > CURRENT_DATE()
    AND BSEG.AUGDT IS NULL, BSEG.DMBTR, 0)

description.value: Open and not yet due amount

formula.value:
IF(BSEG.H_BUDAT < CURRENT_DATE() AND BSEG.AUGDT > `cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.NetDueDateCalc`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T)
    AND BSEG.AUGDT IS NOT NULL, BSEG.DMBTR, 0)

IF(BSEG.H_BUDAT < CURRENT_DATE() AND BSEG.AUGDT <= `cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.NetDueDateCalc`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T)
    AND BSEG.AUGDT IS NOT NULL, BSEG.DMBTR, 0)

description.value: Amount cleared on or before due date

formula.value:
IF(BSEG.H_BUDAT < CURRENT_DATE() AND `cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.NetDueDateCalc`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T) < CURRENT_DATE()
    AND BSEG.AUGDT IS NULL, BSEG.DMBTR, 0)

IF(BSEG.H_BUDAT < CURRENT_DATE() AND (DATE_DIFF(`cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.NetDueDateCalc`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T), CURRENT_DATE(), DAY) > 90 )
    AND BSEG.AUGDT IS NULL, BSEG.DMBTR, 0)
DATE_DIFF( `cortex-prj-dev.REPORTING.NetDueDateCalc`(BSEG.KOART, BSEG.ZFBDT, BKPF.BLDAT, BSEG.SHKZG, BSEG.REBZG, BSEG.ZBD3T, BSEG.ZBD2T, BSEG.ZBD1T), CURRENT_DATE(), DAY)
IF(bseg.koart = 'D' AND bseg.augdt IS NULL AND bseg.H_BUDAT < CURRENT_DATE(), bseg.dmbtr, 0)
IF(bseg.koart = 'D' AND bseg.H_BUDAT < CURRENT_DATE() AND bseg.xumsw = 'X', bseg.dmbtr, 0)
